bwwExcerpt: At one point in the return engagement of 700 Sundays, Billy Crystal recalls the first comedian he ever saw: an old-school tummler, circa 1958, prowling the stage at Kutsher's "like a panther." All these decades later, Crystal impersonates this creature, with his disowned aggression and tired shtick ...
